name: places/ChIJsWHzvaD2wokRzDU8pTQdBwk
formattedAddress: 8 Magaw Pl #4b, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 8 Magaw Pl #4b, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: We love this daycare! We’ve been part of happy home daycare for almost 2 years. The staff goes above and beyond to care for my 2 kids. My daughter is 3 yo and she loves going to her daycare, and my 9 month old too. He is there since 3 month old. I have never encounter any issues. My kids are very well fed, cared for and loved there. As a pediatrician myself I take safety very seriously and have never had any reservations leaving my children under their care. The owner is always available, sends updates. I have never found my children with any rashes or being left alone. They have open door policy and any time I have gone unannounced I have not found my or any othe children unsafe or misstreated or left alone. I come from Queens everyday with them because its our best option! My daughter’s speech has flourished and my son is thriving in his development!

originalText.text: We love this daycare! My daughter has been coming here since she was 3 months old. I have never had any type of issues. As a teacher, I’m very picky on who stays with my child, mostly because I need her to play and learn. My baby is 2 years old now and I travel from New Jersey daily, because in this daycare she’s love and cared for like she is one of their own kids!

originalText.text: Happy Home is a wonderful daycare! My daughter went here for daycare and I can only say positive things about it. Claribel and her team do an amazing job. The environment is safe and clean and the caretakers are loving. After dropping off my daughter at Happy Home, I would feel relaxed knowing that she was in good hands. I highly recommend this daycare.

text.text: Happy Home is a wonderful daycare! My daughter went here for daycare and I can only say positive things about it. Claribel and her team do an amazing job. The environment is safe and clean and the caretakers are loving. After dropping off my daughter at Happy Home, I would feel relaxed knowing that she was in good hands. I highly recommend this daycare.

originalText.text: My husband and I just started with happy home daycare and I’m beyond happy and relaxed to see that our 3 months old son is all smiles there and doing well! We are ourselves so relieved to have found such a  good team. Claribel, Seli and the two others caregivers just love what they do and you can tell by the kids behaviors and smiles that things are going well. My toddler one who attends another daycare right next door is always proud to go pick up his little brother and found the place cool! If it wasn’t for all the friends he already made a the other daycare I’m sure he will join as well. The place is clean, the video camera are a big relief and  so is the mama apps. I will def update in few months but for now we are grateful. Thank you guys.

originalText.text: We had an awesome experience with Claribel, Selli and team. They are very easy to talk to, caring, loving, great cooks and the kids always look happy! They are very well fed! The app is updated daily with their meals, pictures, nap time, etc. Selli is available during after hours which is extremely helpful. Highly recommend!
